dcterms:creator: T. Chen
T. Jing
R. Tian
Y. Chen
J. Domeyer
H. Toyoda
R. Sherony
Z. Ding
dcterms:description: A dataset comprising 348 short video clips, each extensively annotated to depict various road actors and scenarios across diverse driving locations, traffic, and weather conditions. The dataset annotations encompass spatial, behavioral, contextual, and pedestrian information.
dcterms:title: Joint Attention for Autonomous Driving (JAAD)

dcterms:creator: T. Chen
T. Jing
R. Tian
Y. Chen
J. Domeyer
H. Toyoda
R. Sherony
Z. Ding
dcterms:description: The dataset comprises 104 training videos, 34 validation videos, and 48 testing videos, collectively covering 196 scenes. It includes bounding box annotations for traffic objects and agents, which are accompanied by text descriptions and reasoning explanations.
dcterms:title: Pedestrian Situated Intent (PSI)

dcterms:creator: R. Izquierdo
A. Quintanar
I. Parra
D. Fern√°ndez-Llorca
M. A. Sotelo
dcterms:description: A novel benchmark for prediction of vehicles intentions, providing a dataset that includes various scenarios for vehicle behavior prediction.
dcterms:title: PREVENTION

dcterms:creator: R. Krajewski
J. Bock
L. Kloeker
L. Eckstein
dcterms:description: A drone dataset of naturalistic vehicle trajectories on German highways for validation of highly automated driving systems.
dcterms:title: HighD
